price: Quienes creen y obran rectamente serán los bienaventurados, tendrán un destino hermoso.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ طُوبَىٰ لَهُمۡ وَحُسۡنُ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ṭūbā lahum waḥus'nu maābin
